en: I could not stand my house being torn down.
zh: 我受不了我的房子被拆了。

en: I discovered too late that I left out the most important part of my speech.
zh: 我发现得太晚了，演讲最关键的部分漏掉了。

en: I'm not satisfied with my English ability.
zh: 我对我的英语水平不太满意。

en: I have no great belief in my doctor.
I made known my intentions to my parents.
zh: 我把我的打算告诉了我爸妈。

en: I did it against my will.
I told a lie against my will.
I decided on telling her of my love.
I will have my own way.
zh: 我要按我自己的想法来。

en: I was wary of showing my intentions.
zh: 我很小心，不想暴露我的意图。

en: I'm interested in creating my own web pages.
zh: 我对制作自己的网页挺感兴趣的。

en: I lay on my bed.
I was ashamed of my behavior.
zh: 我对自己的行为感到羞愧。

en: I did so for the sake of my health.
I bought this book for myself, not for my wife.
zh: 这书是我给自己买的，不是给我老婆买的。

en: I'm very ashamed of myself about what I've done.
zh: 我对自己做过的事情感到非常羞愧。

en: I'm sorry for what I have done.
zh: 我对我所做的事感到抱歉。

en: I'm sorry for what I've done.
zh: 我对我做过的事很抱歉。

en: I have no regrets for what I have done.
zh: 我对自己做过的事不后悔。

en: I can only speak for myself.
I wondered if I could do such a thing.
zh: 我在想我是不是真的能做出这种事。

en: I hope to find a job of my own choosing.
zh: 我希望能找一份我自选的工作。

en: I myself was not conscious of it, but I may have been jealous of his success.
zh: 我自己没察觉，但我可能挺嫉妒他的成功的。

en: I'm learning to sew so that I can make myself a dress.
zh: 我在学缝纫，好给自己做件裙子。

en: I will do it myself.
I solved that problem by myself.
zh: 那问题是我自己解决的。

en: I have to go there myself.
I want to finish the work on my own.
zh: 我想自己一个人完成这项工作。

en: I realized that what I had chosen didn't really interest me.
zh: 我发现我选的其实我根本不感兴趣。

en: I believe I am in the right.
I am convinced that I am right.
I can prove that I am right.
I hope I am very efficient.
zh: 我希望我办事效率很高。

en: I don't have to apologize for what I said.
zh: 我没必要为我说过的话道歉。

en: I count myself lucky in having good health.
zh: 我觉得自己身体健康，挺幸运的。

en: I find it necessary to be able to say what I feel.
zh: 我觉得能表达出自己的感受很有必要。

en: I like to think I know what I'm talking about.
zh: 我觉得我知道自己在说什么。

en: I know what a lucky boy I am.
I am proud of being a doctor.
zh: 我为自己是一名医生感到自豪。

en: I'm sure of winning the championship.
I found myself bored by the book.
zh: 我觉得这本书挺无聊的。

en: I have no regrets about what I did.
zh: 我对我做过的事一点也不后悔。

en: I'm very proud of the job I chose myself.
zh: 我为自己选的这份工作感到非常自豪。

en: I know that I am a good teacher.
zh: 我知道我是一个好老师。

en: I know that I'm a good teacher.
I know I'm a good teacher.
zh: 我知道自己是个好老师。

en: I held the party at my own expense.
zh: 聚会是我自掏腰包办的。

en: I have a car.
I must have my car fixed in a few days.
zh: 我过几天得去把车修一下。

en: I had my bicycle stolen.
I must have my bicycle repaired.
I got my bicycle repaired.
I have a bicycle.
I don't have a bicycle, let alone a car.
zh: 我连自行车都没有，更别说汽车了。

en: I oiled my bicycle.
I can ride a bicycle.
I want to ride a bicycle, because I live far from my school.
zh: 我想骑车上学，因为我家离学校挺远的。

en: I got on a bicycle and chased after the thief.
zh: 我骑上自行车就去追那个小偷了。

en: I must ride a bicycle.
I go to school by bicycle.
When I fell off my bicycle, I couldn't get up for a few minutes.
zh: 我从自行车上摔下来以后，好几分钟都起不来。

en: I found my bicycle gone.
zh: 我发现我的自行车不见了。

en: I'm used to cooking for myself.
I want to have my own room.
I can't help loving my country.
I didn't say such a thing of my own will.
My ears sometimes ring.
zh: 我耳朵有时候会嗡嗡响。

en: I listened but could not hear any sound.
zh: 我仔细听了，但什么声音也听不到。

en: I was all ears.
I turned page after page.
I'm getting off at the next stop.
I am busy preparing for the next exam.
zh: 我正忙着准备下次考试呢。

en: I will be seeing the doctor again next Friday.
zh: 我下周五还要去看医生。

en: I must get off at the next station.
I will take the next plane for New York.
zh: 我坐下一班飞机去纽约。

en: I was puzzled about what to do next.
zh: 我不知道接下来该怎么办。

en: I was at a loss what to do next.
zh: 我当时不知所措，不知道下一步该干嘛。

en: I asked my teacher what to do next.
zh: 我问老师接下来该做什么。

en: I asked my teacher what I should do next.
zh: 我问老师我接下来该怎么做。

en: I am having trouble with one thing after another.
zh: 我最近麻烦事儿一件接一件。

en: I am forever in trouble.
I read newspapers in order to keep up with the times.
zh: 我看报纸是为了跟上时代。

en: I went to the theater to see a period drama.
zh: 我去剧院看了一场古装剧。

en: I read books and magazines to keep up with the times.
zh: 我看书和杂志是为了跟上时代。

en: I read a newspaper every day so that I may keep up with the time.
zh: 我每天都看报纸，好让自己不落伍。

en: I can run at the rate of fifty miles an hour.
zh: 我一小时能跑五十英里。

en: I meet her at school now and then.
zh: 我偶尔会在学校碰到她。

en: I make it a rule to read the newspaper every day lest I should fall behind the times.
zh: 我坚持每天看报纸，以免跟不上时代。

en: I read three kinds of newspapers in order to keep abreast with the times.
zh: 我读三种报纸，为了了解时事。

en: I sometimes talk to my neighbor across the fence.
zh: 我偶尔会隔着篱笆跟邻居聊天。

en: I sometimes cook dinner.
I visit my friend's house at intervals.
zh: 我隔三差五会去朋友家坐坐。

en: I sometimes visit my friends' homes.
zh: 我有时会去朋友家串门。

en: I feel sad every now and then.
I sometimes play tennis with her.
zh: 我有时会和她一起打网球。

en: I call on him sometimes.
I meet him from time to time.
I like to ride a horse now and then.
I go to the library from time to time.
I sometimes get uneasy about the future.
zh: 我有时会对未来感到不安。

en: I fall asleep in the class every now and then.
I sometimes dream of home.
I'm sometimes in a bad temper.
I go to the movies once in a while.
I would sometimes travel abroad alone.
zh: 我以前有时会一个人出国旅游。

en: I have occasional pains in the stomach.
I sometimes have pain in my stomach.
I sometimes enjoy my leisure in fishing.
zh: 我闲暇时有时会去钓钓鱼。

en: I sometimes use scissors as a can opener.
zh: 我有时会拿剪刀当开罐器用。

en: I play tennis once in a while.
I meet him at the club from time to time.
zh: 我时不时会在俱乐部碰到他。

en: I sometimes skate.
At times I confuse curve with carve.
zh: 我有时会把 curve 和 carve 搞混。

en: I sometimes wrote him a very long letter.
zh: 我以前有时会给他写很长的信。

en: I sometimes escape from my office and have a cup of coffee.
zh: 我偶尔会从办公室溜出去喝杯咖啡。

en: I looked up the arrival time in the timetable.
zh: 我查了下时刻表上的到达时间。

en: I lost my watch.
I bought a watch and I lost it the next day.
zh: 我买了个表，结果第二天就丢了。

en: I bought a watch.
I bought a watch, and I lost it the day after.
zh: 我买了个表，隔天就丢了。

en: I put my watch in for repair.
I have lost my watch.
I bought a watch with cash.
I lost my watch, so I have to buy one.
zh: 我手表丢了，得再去买一个。

en: I am going to have my watch repaired by John.
zh: 我打算让约翰帮我修下表。

en: I must put my watch forward two minutes.
I advanced the hands on the clock.
I used much money for the repair of a clock.
zh: 我修这个钟花了不少钱。

en: I checked the time on the clock.
I make a point of being punctual.
I'm paid by the hour.
I've got time on my hands.
I did not reach school in time.
I failed to go there in time.
I hired a boat by the hour.
I rented a boat by the hour.
I have no time.
I am out of time.
I don't have time.
I rarely go to the movies.
I meet him at school now and then.
zh: 我以后在学校时不时会碰到他。

en: I sold the best jewel that I had.
zh: 我卖掉了我最值钱的珠宝。

en: I was thrown out of the house bag and baggage.
zh: 我连人带行李被赶出了家门。

en: I was thrown out of the house with everything I owned.
zh: 我带着我所有的东西被赶出了家门。

en: I got over the difficulty with my characteristic tenacity.
zh: 我凭着自己的韧劲儿克服了困难。

en: I don't have any money on hand.
I can give you several instances.
zh: 我可以给你举几个例子。

en: I was given the task of cleaning the office.
zh: 我被安排了打扫办公室的任务。

en: I called for Mr Stone at the office.
zh: 我去办公室找了斯通先生。

en: Circumstances did not permit me to help you.
I made the fact known to all my friends.
zh: 我把这件事告诉了我所有的朋友。

en: I know it for a fact.
I blamed him for the accident.
I was called out to the scene of the accident.
I ask these questions by way of finding out the cause of the accident.
zh: 我问这些是为了查明事故原因。

en: I was late on account of an accident.
We were held up for two hours on account of the accident.
zh: 因为那场事故，我们被耽搁了两个小时。

en: I was late for school on account of an accident.
zh: 因为出了点意外，我上学迟到了。

en: I got my right leg hurt in the accident.
zh: 我的右腿在事故中受伤了。

en: I turned over the business to my son.
zh: 我把生意交给我儿子打理了。

en: I am going to ascertain the truth of the matter.
zh: 我要去查明事情的真相。

en: I revealed the truth of the matter.
I must postpone going to the dentist.
I've been to the dentist's.
I had my teeth examined at the dentist's.
zh: 我在牙医那儿检查了牙齿。

en: Need I go to the dentist's?
Do I need to go to the dentist's?
I remember reading about a dog that had eaten its owner.
zh: 我记得读过关于一只狗把主人吃了的消息。

en: I keep a female cat.
I intend to challenge him to a game.
I must prepare for the exam.
I stayed up late preparing for the examination.
zh: 为了准备考试，我熬夜了。

en: I have to have an interview before taking the examination.
zh: 考试前我得先参加面试。

en: I ran through the textbook once more before the examination.
zh: 考试前我又把课本翻了一遍。

en: I am anxious about the results of the examination.
I failed the exam.
I studied hard so that I could pass the examination.
zh: 我努力学习是为了能通过考试。

en: I studied hard in order to pass the examination.
zh: 为了通过考试，我学习很刻苦。

en: I am studying hard so that I can pass the exam.
zh: 我正拼命学习，好通过考试。

en: I exerted myself to pass the examination.
zh: 为了通过考试，我费了很大的劲。

en: I will do my best to pass the examination.
I passed the exam and so did Tom.
zh: 我考过了，汤姆也考过了。

en: I was happy to pass the exam.
I made several mistakes in the exam.
zh: 我考试时犯了好几个错误。

en: I made some mistakes on the test.
I tried standing on my head.
I tried climbing the mountain.
I would like to try this dress on.
zh: 我想试穿一下这件衣服。

en: I like poets, such as Takuboku.
I have an inclination for poetry.
I have weak sight.
I am quite healthy and have had no cold.
zh: 我身体挺健康的，没怎么感冒过。

en: I cut the paper with a pair of scissors.
I wrote down his phone number on a scrap of paper.
zh: 我把他的电话号码记在了一张小纸片上。

en: I put down his address on paper.
zh: 我把他的地址写在了纸上。

en: I wrote down his address on a piece of paper.
zh: 我把他的地址写在了一张纸上。

en: We did it ourselves.
I am going to write about our parks and mountains.
zh: 我打算写写我们的公园和山脉。

en: I want to improve myself.
I doubt if anyone even remembers his name now, except for me.
zh: 我怀疑除了我，现在根本没人记得他的名字了。

en: I was annoyed with him for keeping me waiting.
zh: 他让我等那么久，我很不爽。

en: I asked the villagers many times to let me die.
zh: 我求过村里人很多次，让他们让我死掉。

en: I am loved by my parents.
I'm loved by my parents.
I see with my eyes.
I was not as strong as my father.
zh: 我以前没我爸那么强壮。

en: I wasn't as strong as my father.
zh: 我以前没我爸那么强壮。

en: I smell with my nose.
I think with my head.
I'm doing my homework.
I am doing my homework.
I had my picture taken.
I hear with my ears.
I don't have much in common with my left-handed boyfriend.
zh: 我和我那个左撇子男朋友没什么共同点。

en: I viewed my action in the light of a crime.
zh: 我觉得我这种行为就是在犯罪。

en: I viewed my action as a crime.
zh: 我把我的行为看作是一种犯罪。

en: It is interesting for me to read my old diary.
zh: 读以前的日记对我来说挺有意思的。

en: It's fun to read my old diary.
I claimed my baggage.
I am proud of my pretty cat.
zh: 我为我那只漂亮的猫感到自豪。

en: I like the way she laughs at my jokes.
zh: 我喜欢她被我的笑话逗乐的样子。

en: I'm looking for my camera.
I've spent almost all my money.
I know a woman whose first and last names are the same as mine.
zh: 我认识一个跟我同名同姓的女人。

en: I saved for future needs a little money as our marriage fund.
zh: 我存了点钱作为我们的结婚基金。

en: I didn't say anything at all about our plan.
zh: 关于我们的计划，我什么都没说。

en: I am the tallest in our class.
I'm the tallest in our class.
I think it important that we should keep calm.
zh: 我觉得我们保持冷静很重要。

en: I think it's important for us to stay calm.
zh: 我认为保持冷静对我们来说很重要。

en: I was led to the conclusion that we made a fatal mistake.
zh: 我得出的结论是，我们犯了一个致命的错误。

en: I thought that we would be good friends from the beginning.
zh: 我从一开始就觉得我们会成为好朋友。

en: I am not keen on anything that is after life.
I will abolish capital punishment.
I worked as if there were no tomorrow.
zh: 我拼命工作，好像没有明天一样。

en: I will fight to the last breath.
It was his narrative that bored me to death.
zh: 他的讲述简直让我无聊透顶。

en: I want to die, but I cannot.
I have no idea what death is like.
zh: 我不知道死是什么样子的。

en: I had to finish the job by the stated date.
zh: 我必须在规定日期前完成这项工作。

en: I burned my fingertip.
I had no feeling in my fingers.
I ran a splinter into my finger.
zh: 我的手指扎进了一根刺。

en: I burst out laughing in spite of myself.
zh: 我情不自禁地笑了起来。

en: I wept in spite of myself.
zh: 我情不自禁地流下了眼泪。

en: I was able to finish the work earlier than I had expected.
zh: 我完成工作的速度比预想的要快。

en: I dare not speak to her.
I chanced talking to her.
I took it upon myself to telephone the police.
I mustered up my courage and went there.
I screwed up my courage and went there.
I was amazed at the unexpected result.
zh: 结果出人意料，我被惊到了。

en: I will work to the best of my ability.
I borrow books from the city library.
I ran for mayor.
I addressed a petition to the mayor.
zh: 我向市长递交了请愿书。

en: I have been acquainted with the mayor for more than twenty years.
zh: 我跟市长认识二十多年了。

en: I bought this old clock at an antique stall in the market.
zh: 我在市场的古玩摊上买了这口旧钟。

en: I bought three apples and two bunches of grapes for dessert at the market.
zh: 我在市场买了三个苹果和两串葡萄当饭后甜点。

en: I believe it my duty to protect these children.
zh: 我觉得保护这些孩子是我的责任。

en: I believe it's my duty to protect these children.
zh: 我觉得保护这些孩子是我的义务。

en: I cannot tolerate noisy children.
I remonstrated with him about his treatment of his children.
zh: 我就他对待孩子的方式劝说过他。

en: I have to think of my children.
zh: 我得为我的孩子们着想。

en: I supplied the children with necessary books.
zh: 我给孩子们提供了必要的书籍。

en: I saw the children walk across the street.
zh: 我看到孩子们穿过了马路。

en: I am greatly blessed in my children.
zh: 有这些孩子是我的福气。

en: I don't like being treated like a child.
zh: 我不喜欢被当成小孩对待。

en: I went to church every Sunday when I was a boy.
zh: 我小时候每个周日都去教堂。

en: I used to swim every day when I was a child.
zh: 我小时候每天都去游泳。

en: I have lived here since I was a boy.
zh: 我从小就一直住在这儿。

en: I've lived here since I was a boy.
When I was a kid, I was all thumbs.
When I was a little boy, I often went fishing with my brother in the river.
zh: 我小时候经常跟我哥哥去河边钓鱼。

en: I object to being treated like a child.
zh: 我反对被当成小孩对待。

en: I have known him ever since he was a child.
zh: 我从他小时候起就认识他了。

en: I could swim well even when I was a boy.
zh: 我小时候游泳就很厉害。

en: I could swim well even when I was a child.
zh: 我小时候游泳就很厉害。

en: Even when I was a child, I was able to swim well.
zh: 即便是在小时候，我游泳也游得很好。

en: I could swim well when I was a boy.
zh: 我小时候游泳游得挺好。

en: I could swim well when I was a child.
zh: 我小时候游泳游得挺好。

en: I was able to swim well when I was a child.
I loved reading when I was a child.
I'm proud of having run fast as a boy.
zh: 我为自己小时候跑得快感到自豪。

en: I was a healthy child.
I have known Tom since I was a little boy.
When I was a kid, I dreamed of becoming a star like Seiko Matsuda.
zh: 我小时候梦想成为像松田圣子那样的明星。

en: I used to like walking in the rain when I was a child.
zh: 我小时候喜欢在雨中漫步。

en: As a boy, I used to go fishing.
zh: 我小时候以前常去钓鱼。

en: I used to go fishing in the river when I was a child.
zh: 我小时候以前常去河里钓鱼。

en: I'm not a child, but sometimes you talk to me as if I were a child.
zh: 我又不是小孩，但你有时跟我说话就像对着小孩一样。

en: I bought the book which the children need.
zh: 我买了孩子们需要的书。

en: I heard the children singing together.
I told an amusing story to the children.
zh: 我给孩子们讲了一个有趣的故事。

en: I like children. That's why I became a teacher.
zh: 我喜欢孩子，这就是我当老师的原因。

en: I think it dangerous for children to swim in this lake.
zh: 我觉得小孩在这个湖里游泳很危险。

en: I think it's dangerous for children to swim in this lake.
zh: 我觉得小孩在这个湖里游泳很危险。

en: I don't have any children.
I don't have kids.
I don't have any kids.
I have no children.
I don't have children.
I have no kids.
I can't make a decision on the spot. I'll have to talk to my boss first.
zh: 我没法当场做决定，得先跟老板商量一下。

en: I left my baby in her care and went shopping.
zh: 我把宝宝交给她照看，然后去逛街了。

en: I couldn't eat fish when I was a child.
I objected to being treated like a child.
zh: 我反对比像个小孩一样被对待。

en: I don't know both of the sisters.
I have more dresses than my sister.
zh: 我的连衣裙比我妹的多。

en: I am less slender than my sister is.
I'm going off to Vancouver next week to see my sister.
zh: 我下周要去温哥华看我姐。

en: I consulted with my sister.
I turned to my sister for a piece of advice.
zh: 我找我姐给我出出主意。

en: I was helped to do my homework by my sister.
I cooperated with my sister in cleaning the room.
zh: 我和我妹一起打扫了房间。

en: I went to the zoo with my sister.
I hope that my sister will pass the entrance examination.
zh: 我希望我妹能通过入学考试。

en: I want the same watch as my sister has.
zh: 我想要一块和我姐一模一样的手表。

en: I saw my sister tear up the letter.
zh: 我看见我妹把信给撕了。

en: I had wanted to catch the first train.
I was in a great hurry to take the first train.
I must catch the first train.
I got up early so that I might be in time for the first train.
zh: 我起得很早，为了能赶上头班车。

en: I board the train at the terminal.
I made an early start in order to catch the first bus.
zh: 我早点出发是为了赶上头班公交车。

en: You are in my thoughts at all times.
I had great difficulty at the beginning.
zh: 我刚开始的时候挺难的。

en: I said all along that he was not a person to be trusted, but you would not listen to me.
zh: 我一直都说他这人不靠谱，但你就是不听。

en: I am from Shikoku.
I like summer best of the four seasons.
I took the lift to the third floor.
I took the elevator to the fourth floor.
I can't stand raw fish.
I discharged one of my servants.
I put the used syringes in a can for safe disposal.
zh: 我把用过的注射器放进罐子里好处理掉。

en: I was compelled to hold a strap.
I thought only Japanese were workaholics.
zh: 我原以为只有日本人是工作狂。

en: I had an accident at work.
zh: 我在干活的时候出了点意外。

en: I do not like anyone to intrude when I am working.
zh: 我工作的时候不喜欢别人打扰。

en: I considered changing my job, but in the end I decided not to.
zh: 我考虑过换工作，但最后还是决定不换了。

en: I'm looking for work.
I carried on my work.
I continued working.
I did the whole of the work by myself.
zh: 这活儿全是我一个人干的。

en: I did all the work myself.
zh: 这工作全是我自己做的。

en: I made an effort to finish my work.
Having finished the work, I went to the coffee shop for a rest.
zh: 干完活后，我去咖啡馆歇了会儿。

en: I lost my job and I have no money. I'm at my wit's end.
zh: 我丢了工作还没钱，真不知该怎么办了。

en: I had to hurry the work.
I will endeavor to complete my task.
I check off each task on my list as soon as I complete it.
zh: 我每完成一项任务，就立刻把它从清单上勾掉。

en: I got through with my work just now.
zh: 我刚才忙完手头的活儿。

en: I still have a lot of work to do.
I always feel pleased when I've finished a piece of work.
zh: 每次干完一项工作，我都会觉得挺开心的。

en: I put my family before my career.
zh: 我觉得家庭比事业更重要。

en: I work hard and play hard.
zh: 我工作起来很拼，玩起来也挺疯。

en: I'm serious about my job.
I'm satisfied with my work.
zh: 我对自己的工作挺满意的。

en: I am up to my neck in work.
I must go about my work.
I stayed home all day instead of going to work.
zh: 我今天没去上班，在家待了一整天。

en: I don't like to mix business with pleasure.
zh: 我不喜欢把工作和娱乐混在一起。

en: I'm busy with work.
I was exhausted from work.
I was tired with the work.
zh: 这工作让我觉得挺累的。

en: I was tired from the work.
I was out of town on an assignment.
I was abroad on an assignment.
I'm very tired from work.
I'm busy with the work all the time.
zh: 我一直都在忙这个工作。

en: I'm always busy with work.
I just flew in on business.
I come into contact with all kinds of people in my work.
zh: 我在工作中会接触到各色各样的人。

en: I have come to see you on business.
I was told to wait for a while.
I suggested going for a walk.
I have no mind to go for a walk.
I'm not in the mood to go for a walk.
I don't feel like going for a walk.
I don't even have time for a walk.
zh: 我连散步的时间都没有。

en: I like taking a walk.
I like taking walks.
I like walking, especially in the morning.
zh: 我喜欢走路，尤其是早上。

en: I felt ready to give in because of my miserable failure.
zh: 惨痛的失败让我想要放弃了。

en: I saw a chain of mountains.
zh: 我看到了一连串的山脉。

en: I like climbing mountains.
I am thinking of going to the mountains.
I like to walk in the mountains.
I climb mountains because they are there.
zh: 我爬山是因为山就在那里。

en: I go to the mountain.
I didn't need to take an umbrella with me.
I had an umbrella with me but my friend did not.
zh: 我带了伞，但我朋友没带。

en: I have lost my umbrella.
I lost my umbrella.
I've lost my umbrella.
I lived in Japan three years ago.
I have kept a diary for three years.
zh: 我坚持写了三年日记了。

en: I've kept a diary for three years.
I was engaged in it for three years, that is, till I was twenty years old.
zh: 我做那件事做了三年，直到我二十岁。

en: I read it in the magazine three days ago.
zh: 三天前我在杂志上读到了这个。

en: I am the tallest of the three.
I found my father's diary which he kept for 30 years.
zh: 我找到了我爸写了三十年的日记。

en: I found the diary that my father kept for 30 years.
zh: 我找到了我爸写了三十年的那本日记。

en: I found my father's diary that he kept for 30 years.
zh: 我找到了我爸那本写了三十年的日记。

en: I found a diary my father kept for thirty years.
zh: 我发现了一本我爸写了三十年的日记。

en: I reserved my hotel room three weeks in advance.
zh: 我提前三周订好了酒店房间。

en: I will stay here till three o'clock.
I must go to the station at three o'clock.
I have been taking ballet lessons since I was three and hope to be a ballerina.
zh: 我从三岁就开始学芭蕾了，希望能成为一名芭蕾舞演员。

en: I had no more than three pounds.
When I wash dishes, I am all thumbs.
zh: 我一洗碗就笨手笨脚的。

en: I am reading a magazine.
I read about the singer in a magazine, too.
zh: 我也在杂志上看到过那个歌手的消息。

en: I am a citizen of Sapporo.
I painted the fence green.
I slept well last night.
I had a good dream last night.
I had a strange dream last night.
zh: 我昨晚做了个奇怪的梦。

en: Last night I had a weird dream.
zh: 昨晚我做了个特别奇怪的梦。

en: I got acquainted with him last night.
I caught up on all my homework last night.
zh: 我昨晚把作业都补完了。

en: I wrote a letter last night.
Last night I wrote a letter.
My car was stolen last night.
I had my car stolen last night.
I had my bicycle stolen last night.
My bike was stolen last night.
I slept comfortably last night.
I did not sleep well last night.
I didn't sleep well last night.
I slept little last night.
I'd rather have gone to the concert last night.
zh: 我昨晚要是去听音乐会就好了。

en: I watched TV last night.
Last night I fell asleep with television on.
zh: 昨晚我看着电视就睡着了。

en: I spent two hours watching a baseball game on TV last night.
zh: 我昨晚花了两个小时看棒球赛直播。

en: I finished reading the book last night.
zh: 我昨晚把那本书看完了。

en: I enjoyed watching soccer last night.
zh: 我昨晚看足球赛看得很开心。

en: I arrived here last night.
I had a funny dream last night.
zh: 我昨晚做了个好玩的梦。

en: I had a bad dream last night.
I sat up till late last night.
I stayed at home last night.
I watched the baseball game last night.
I wrote three letters last night.
I was in trouble with the police last night.
I was harried by mosquitoes last night.
zh: 我昨晚被蚊子折腾得够呛。

en: I didn't sleep a wink last night.
I met my teacher by accident at the restaurant last night.
zh: 我昨晚在餐厅碰巧遇到了老师。

en: I met my teacher by chance at a restaurant last night.
zh: 我昨晚在一家餐厅碰巧遇到了老师。

en: I met my teacher by chance at the restaurant last night.
zh: 我昨晚在那家餐厅碰巧遇到了老师。

en: I happened to run into my teacher at a restaurant last night.
zh: 我昨晚在餐厅碰见我老师了。

en: I happened to run into my teacher at the restaurant last night.
zh: 我昨晚在那家餐厅碰巧遇到了我老师。

en: I listened to some records last night.
I stayed up till very late last night.
I seem to have misplaced my key last night.
zh: 我昨晚好像把钥匙放错地方了。

en: I listened to some CDs last night.
I'll never forget shaking the President's hand last year.
zh: 我永远忘不了去年和总统握手的情景。

en: I retired last year.
I went to Vienna for the first time last year.
zh: 我去年第一次去维也纳。

en: I started sailing last year.
I remember being introduced to him at a party last year.
zh: 我记得去年在派对上被介绍给他认识。

en: I decided to come to Japan last year.
Last year, I decided to come to Japan.
I will never forget meeting that popular writer last year.
zh: 我永远忘不了去年见到那位有名的作家。

en: I cooked supper last night.
I went to see the baseball game yesterday.
zh: 我昨天去看棒球比赛了。

en: I wasn't busy yesterday.
I was busy yesterday.
I didn't have to study yesterday.
I caught a cold yesterday.
I helped my father yesterday.
I was ill yesterday.
Yesterday I was ill.
I read a most interesting novel yesterday.
zh: 我昨天看了一本特别有意思的小说。

en: I received her letter yesterday.
I passed by her house yesterday.
I really regret what I said to her yesterday.
zh: 我真的很后悔昨天对她说的话。

en: I paid him a visit yesterday.
I helped him yesterday.
I called at his house yesterday.
I called him up yesterday.
I met him yesterday, when he told me the news.
zh: 我昨天见到他了，他跟我说了那个消息。

en: I met him yesterday.
I arrived in Tokyo yesterday.
I was in Tokyo yesterday.
I went fishing in the river yesterday.
I caught a big fish yesterday.
I got up early yesterday.
Yesterday I got up early.
I didn't study at all yesterday.
I went swimming in the river yesterday.
I went to swim in the river yesterday.
zh: 我昨天去河里游了个泳。

en: I wasn't born yesterday!
I met him yesterday for the first time.
zh: 挑战我昨天第一次见到他。

en: I played tennis yesterday for the first time.
I wrote a letter yesterday.
I had my bicycle fixed yesterday.
I had my watch stolen yesterday.
I lost my watch yesterday.
I got a new battery put in my watch yesterday.
zh: 我昨天给手表换了块新电池。

en: Having finished the work yesterday, I am free today.
zh: 昨天把活儿干完了，今天我挺闲的。

en: I was absent from work yesterday.
I had to work overtime yesterday.
I was happy yesterday.
Yesterday I was caught in a shower on my way home from walking in the park.
zh: 昨天在公园散完步回家的路上，我被雨淋了。

en: I went to the park yesterday.
Yesterday I went to the park.
I saw Miss Smith in the theater yesterday.
zh: 我昨天在剧院见到史密斯小姐了。

en: I had never seen such an exciting rugby match as one I saw yesterday.
zh: 我从来没看过像昨天那么精彩的橄榄球赛。

en: I quarrelled with my older brother yesterday.
zh: 我昨天跟我哥吵了一架。

en: I had a fight with my older brother yesterday.
zh: 我昨天跟我哥打了一架。

en: I intended to have called on you yesterday.
zh: 我昨天本来打算去看你的。

en: I met your father yesterday.
Yesterday I ran across an old friend of mine at the airport.
zh: 昨天我在机场碰到一个老朋友。

en: I caught five fish yesterday.
I got my wallet stolen in the train yesterday.
zh: 昨天我在火车上钱包被偷了。

en: Yesterday I was caught in a shower on my way home from school.
zh: 昨天放学回家的路上，我被雨淋了。

en: I was late for school yesterday.
I went to school yesterday.
I had to make up for three other employees, who were laid off yesterday.
zh: 昨天有三个同事被裁了，我得替他们三个干活。

en: I attended the meeting yesterday.
I met Tony on my way home yesterday.
zh: 我昨天回家路上碰到托尼了。

en: I went to see the movies yesterday.
I was in bed all day long yesterday.
zh: 我昨天在床上躺了一整天。

en: I turned in a paper yesterday.
I turned in my report yesterday.
I'm much better today than yesterday.
zh: 我今天感觉比昨天好多了。

en: I was obliged to go out yesterday.
I met Mary yesterday.
I went to the park with Mary yesterday.
zh: 我昨天跟玛丽一起去公园了。

en: I had to finish the work by yesterday.
zh: 我最晚昨天就得把活儿干完。

en: I caught a cold and was in bed yesterday.
zh: 我昨天感冒了，在床上躺了一天。

en: I left home without having breakfast yesterday.
zh: 我昨天没吃早饭就出门了。

en: I was home all day yesterday.
I unexpectedly met an old friend of mine on the bus yesterday.
zh: 我昨天在公交车上偶遇了一个老朋友。

en: I ran across an old friend of mine at the party yesterday.
zh: 我昨天在聚会上碰到一个老朋友。

en: I enjoyed myself at the party yesterday.
zh: 我昨天在聚会上玩得很开心。

en: I watched TV at six last night.
I was watching TV at this time yesterday.
zh: 昨天这时候我正在看电视。

en: It was not until yesterday that I learned the truth.
zh: 直到昨天我才知道真相。

en: It was not until yesterday that I knew it.
zh: 直到昨天我才知道这件事。

en: It was not till yesterday that I knew the fact.
zh: 直到昨天我才知道事实真相。

en: It was not until yesterday that I got the news.
zh: 直到昨天我才收到消息。

en: I visited Tony yesterday.
I called at Tony's house yesterday.
I played with Tony yesterday.
zh: 我昨天跟托尼一起玩了。

en: I watched TV yesterday.
I did not play tennis yesterday.
I didn't play tennis yesterday.
I saw an old film featuring Charlie Chaplin yesterday.
zh: 我昨天看了一部卓别林演的老电影。

en: I bought it yesterday.
I hoped to have finished it yesterday.
zh: 我本来希望昨天能做完的。

en: I had hoped to finish it yesterday.
zh: 我原本打算昨天做完的。

en: I bought the book yesterday.
I fixed the car yesterday.
I fixed the bike yesterday.
zh: 我昨天把自行车修好了。

en: I met Ben at the hotel yesterday.
zh: 我昨天在酒店见到 Ben 了。

en: I went there yesterday.
I have not been busy since yesterday.
zh: 我从昨天起就不怎么忙了。

en: I haven't been busy since yesterday.
zh: 我从昨天开始就不忙了。

en: I bought this camera yesterday.
I had to go there yesterday.
I have been busy since yesterday.
zh: 我从昨天起就一直挺忙的。

en: I've been busy since yesterday.
zh: 我从昨天开始就一直很忙。

en: I have lived in Kobe since yesterday.
zh: 我从昨天起就住在神户了。

en: I worked more than eight hours yesterday.
zh: 我昨天干了八个多小时。

en: I had some money stolen yesterday.
I profited 200,000 yen yesterday.
I saw him beaten yesterday.
I read an article about acid rain yesterday.
zh: 我昨天看了一篇关于酸雨的文章。

en: I gave a speech at the wedding yesterday.
zh: 我昨天在婚礼上致辞了。

en: I received a letter in English yesterday.
zh: 我昨天收到一封英文信。

en: I received a letter written in English yesterday.
zh: 我昨天收到一封用英文写的信。

en: I arrived here yesterday.
I came here yesterday.
I stopped playing baseball last season.
zh: 上个赛季我就没打棒球了。

en: I had my brother correct the errors in my composition.
zh: 我让我哥帮我改了作文里的错误。

en: I aim to be a writer.
I come from Saitama.
I left my purse behind.
I contrived to leave my wallet behind.
I had lost my purse, so I couldn't buy the cassette.
zh: 我把钱包丢了，所以没买成磁带。

en: I left the keys with my wallet.
zh: 我把钥匙跟钱包搁一块儿了。

en: I know Mr. Saito by sight, but I haven't met him yet.
zh: 我看齐藤先生面熟，但还没见过面。

en: I confessed my sin.
I don't have much desire for wealth.
I seem to have lost my purse.
I'm old and not too well.
I went to the hospital to see my wife.
I talked my wife out of buying a new carpet.
zh: 我劝我老婆别买新地毯了。

en: I had my wife die.
I told my wife to get ready in a hurry.
zh: 我让我老婆赶紧准备一下。

en: I could not accept that my wife was really dead.
zh: 我没法接受我老婆真的去世了。

en: I resolved I would do my best.
zh: 我下定决心要全力以赴。

en: I was unwilling for my wife to accept the invitation.
zh: 我不想让我老婆接受邀请。

en: I will try to do my best.
I have a bicycle of the latest model.
zh: 我有一辆最新款的自行车。

en: I have to do my best.
I have an up-to-date dictionary.
I couldn't recognize her at first.
My first guess was wide off the mark.
zh: 我最开始猜得太离谱了。

en: I couldn't understand him at first.
zh: 我刚开始没听懂他的话。

en: I didn't know what to do first.
zh: 我一开始不知道该先做什么。

en: I knew that all along.
I knew it from the start.
I was nervous at first, but gradually got more relaxed.
zh: 我刚开始挺紧张的，后来慢慢就放松了。

en: I don't want to risk missing the last train of the day.
zh: 我不想冒赶不上末班车的风险。

en: I was late for the last bus.
I failed to catch the last bus, and came home by taxi.
zh: 我没赶上末班车，只好打车回家。

en: I caught the last bus.
I was in time for the last bus.
I am as happy as can be.
I'm in seventh heaven.
I'm on cloud nine.
I'm as happy as can be.
zh: 我这辈子没这么开心过。

en: I watched for the last chance.
I have not had a cold lately.
I haven't had a cold recently.
I haven't seen him lately.
I have seen him quite recently.
I have a poor appetite these days.
I haven't seen Tom lately.
I haven't met with Tom recently.
I haven't seen Tom recently.
I've been very busy lately.
I have recently given up smoking.
I have been busy lately.
I'm always busy these days.
I can't keep up with the recent British music scene.
zh: 我跟不上最近英国音乐的潮流了。

en: I have not felt well recently.
I haven't felt well recently.
I've not been feeling very well lately.
zh: 我最近一直感觉不太舒服。

en: I spoke to the boy who seemed to be the oldest.
zh: 我跟那个看着年纪最大的男孩说了话。

en: I am the fastest runner.
I saw him again.
I am not used to drinking coffee without sugar.
zh: 我不习惯喝不加糖的咖啡。

en: I like Sachiko better.
I was invited to Sachiko's party.
zh: 我被邀请去参加祥子的派对。

en: I always think of my father when I look at this picture.
zh: 我一看到这张照片就会想起我爸爸。

en: I am a career teacher.
I was embarrassed.
I am interested in the study of insects.
zh: 我对研究昆虫很感兴趣。

en: I am confronted with a difficult problem.
I never turn my back on a friend in need.
zh: 我从不会在朋友有困难时撒手不管。

en: Can you help me out of my trouble?
zh: 你能帮我解决下麻烦吗？

en: Whenever I'm in trouble, I confer with him.
zh: 我一遇到麻烦就会找他商量。

en: I am in trouble.
I am playing baseball.
I'm playing baseball.
I'm playing baseball now.
I have nothing particular to say now.
zh: 我现在没什么特别想说的。

en: I am due to speak tonight.
I am supposed to babysit the children tonight.
I'm going out tonight, regardless.
zh: 反正我今晚肯定要出去。

en: I think I'll take a bath tonight.
Must I attend the party tonight?
zh: 我今晚非得去那个派对吗？

en: Do I have to attend the party tonight?
zh: 我今晚一定要去那个聚会吗？

en: I will catch up on my homework tonight.
I will be with you tonight.
I am reading a book now.
I'm now busy writing a book.
I'm not busy now.
I'm busy now.
I am studying now.
I am not studying now.
I have a cold now.
I can't recall her name at the moment.
zh: 我这会儿想不起她的名字了。

en: I have no thought of seeing her now.
zh: 我现在完全没想过要见她。

en: I don't feel like meeting her now.
I'll leave Tokyo tonight.
I'll leave Tokyo for Osaka tonight.
zh: 我今晚离开东京去大阪。

en: I'm setting off tonight.
I feel like going to bed early tonight.
I don't feel like going out tonight.
I am going to watch TV this evening.
I want to see baseball on television this evening.
zh: 我今晚想在电视上看棒球赛。

en: I am invited to dinner this evening.
I mean to be there this evening.
I will come to your party this evening.
zh: 我今晚会去参加你的派对。

en: I will have finished the work by seven this evening.
zh: 今晚七点前我会把工作做完。

en: I feel like having some pizza tonight.
I've worn out two pairs of shoes this year.
I have been abroad several times this year.
I have had a bad report this year.
I am going abroad this summer.
I get only five days off this summer.
zh: 今年夏天我只有五天假。

en: I promised him that I would come today.
zh: 我答应过他今天会来的。

en: I have to cook dinner today.
I got a letter from her today.
I saw him twice today.
I don't feel like working today.
I am in Tokyo today.
I went shopping in town today.
I didn't have lunch today.
I'm very busy today.
I was going to hand in my application form to the boss today, but he beat me to the punch.
zh: 我本来打算今天把申请表交给老板的，结果被他抢先了。

en: I'm not busy today.
I am free from work today.
I have nothing more to do today.
zh: 我今天没什么要做的了。

en: I'm free today.
I have a bad headache today.
I will play with Naoko this afternoon.
zh: 我今天下午要跟直子一块儿玩。

en: I am going out this afternoon.
I have nothing to do this afternoon.
I am going to study English this afternoon.
I'm going to study English this afternoon.
I'm going to see Mary this afternoon.
I'll be seeing Mary this afternoon.
I am seeing Mary this afternoon.
I was caught in a shower this afternoon.
zh: 我今天下午淋了一场阵雨。

en: I will play tennis this afternoon.
I don't think I will get through all this work this afternoon.
zh: 我觉得今天下午我干不完这么多活。

en: I am taking my son to the zoo this afternoon.
zh: 我下午要带我儿子去动物园。

en: I'm taking my son to the zoo this afternoon.
zh: 我下午打算带我儿子去动物园。

en: I caught sight of George on my way home this afternoon.
zh: 今天下午回家的路上，我看到乔治了。

en: I don't know much about today's revolutions.
zh: 我对现在的革命不太了解。

en: I am to go there today.
I have nothing to do today.
I feel a little bad today.
zh: 我今天感觉有点不舒服。

en: I owe what I am today to my uncle.
zh: 我能有今天，全靠我叔叔。

en: I spent 100 dollars today.
I have to take the entrance examination today.
zh: 我今天得参加入学考试。

en: I'll abstain from going out today.
I bought many books today so I put them in order.
zh: 我今天买了很多书，所以把它们整理了一下。

en: I got hurt today.
I am now in a delicate position.
zh: 我现在的处境挺微妙的。

en: I'll not be at home next Sunday.
I am going to play tennis next Sunday.
I will have been studying for five years next February.
zh: 到明年二月，我就已经学了五年了。

en: I will have been studying English for five years next February.
zh: 到明年二月，我就已经学了五年英语了。

en: I think I'll take the test this time.
zh: 我想我这次会参加考试。

en: I got up at six this morning.
zh: 我今天早上六点起的床。

en: I tried to get up at six this morning.
zh: 我今天早上试着六点起床。

en: I have arrived here safe and sound this morning.
zh: 我今天早上平安到达了这里。

en: I called him this morning.
zh: 我今天早上给他打电话了。

en: As I got the train this morning, I met an old friend of mine.
zh: 今天早上上火车的时候，我碰到了一个老朋友。

en: I reached Nagoya early this morning.
zh: 我今天一大早就到名古屋了。

en: I arrived here safely early this morning.
zh: 我今天一大早就平安抵达了这里。

en: I met him early this morning.
zh: 我今天一大早就见着他了。

en: I met him first thing in the morning.
zh: 我今天一早起来就见到他了。

en: I arrived at Narita Airport this morning.
zh: 我今天早上到了成田机场。

en: I've just eaten breakfast.
I got up at seven this morning.
zh: 我今天早上七点起的床。

en: I got up at seven in the morning.
I took a walk with my dog this morning.
zh: 我今天早上带狗去散步了。

en: I went to church this morning.
I was late for school this morning.
zh: 我今天早上上学迟到了。

en: I wasn't in time for school this morning.
zh: 我今天早上上学没赶上时间。

en: I wasn't on time for school this morning.
zh: 我今天早上没能按时赶到学校。

en: I got to the station this morning.
I ran all the way to the station this morning.
zh: 我今天早上是一路跑到车站的。

en: I was late again this morning, which made my boss angry.
zh: 我今天早上又迟到了，老板挺生气的。

en: I ate bread and butter this morning.
zh: 我今天早上吃了黄油面包。

en: I have been working since six this morning.
zh: 我从今天早上六点就开始干活了。

en: I've been working since six this morning.
zh: 我从今天早上六点就开始干活了。

en: Not until this morning did I learn the truth.
zh: 直到今天早上我才知道真相。

en: I got up very late this morning.
I was surprised at the news this morning.
zh: 今天早上的消息让我挺吃惊的。

en: I was surprised by the news this morning.
zh: 今天早上的消息让我挺惊讶的。

en: I just got here this morning.
I have had a slight fever since this morning.
zh: 我从今天早上起就有低烧。

en: I've had a slight fever since this morning.
zh: 我从今天早上起就有点低烧。

en: I've been waiting here for him since this morning.
zh: 我从今天早上起就在这儿等他了。

en: This morning I got up later than usual.
zh: 我今天早上起得比平时晚。

en: This morning I missed the 8:30 train by five minutes.
zh: 今天早上我晚了五分钟，没赶上八点半那趟车。

en: I slipped and hurt myself while I was clearing the road of snow this morning.
zh: 我今天早上扫雪的时候滑了一跤，摔伤了。

en: I got up late this morning.
I saw Mr Yamada at Shinjuku Station this morning.
zh: 我今天早上在新宿站看到山田先生了。

en: I saw Mr. Yamada at Shinjuku Station this morning.
zh: 我今天早上在新宿站看见了山田先生。

en: I rented a videotape this morning.
zh: 我今天早上租了个录像带。

en: I just arrived now.
I just got here.
I have only just arrived.
I don't feel like eating now.
I've got to do my homework now.
I was told to learn this poem by heart by the end of this week.
zh: 我被要求在这周末之前把这首诗背下来。

en: I'm flying to London for a business meeting this week.
zh: 我这周要飞去伦敦出差开会。

en: I think I will take a vacation this week.
I take a vacation this week.
I'll take a vacation this week.
I am on holiday this week.
I have been busy all this week.
I have been busy this week.
I am writing a letter now.
I'm just beginning.
I am now in an old castle.
I have to reduce my expenses this month.
zh: 我这个月得省着点花钱了。

en: I have a slight headache now.
I'm at the airport now.
I live in Kyoto now.
I'm on vacation.
I haven't studied physics much all semester.
zh: 我这学期基本上没怎么学物理。

en: I have hardly studied this term, so I'm going to study hard next term.
zh: 我这学期几乎没怎么学，下学期得努力了。

en: I got terrible grades this term.
I'm going to get my own way this time.
zh: 这次我打算按我自己的想法来。

en: I'm free now.
What am I to do now?
What should I do now?
I don't feel like eating anything now.
I don't smoke now, but I used to.
zh: 我现在不抽烟了，但我以前抽。

en: I am studying English now.
I am now under a doctor's care.
I've never given anyone a Hermes scarf.
zh: 我从来没送过别人爱马仕围巾。

en: I'm proud to think that I have never yet been late to school.
zh: 我很自豪自己上学从来没迟到过。

en: Never in my life have I seen such a peaceful sight.
zh: 我这辈子还没见过这么宁静的景象。

en: I have been satisfied with my work so far.
zh: 目前为止我对我的工作还挺满意的。

en: I've read some hundred books so far.
zh: 到目前为止我已经读了大概一百本书了。

en: Never have I heard anyone say a thing like that.
zh: 我从来没听过有人说那样的话。

en: Never have I dreamed such a strange dream.
zh: 我从来没做过这么奇怪的梦。

en: Never have I seen such a cute puppy as this.
zh: 我从来没见过这么可爱的小狗。

en: This is the cutest puppy I've ever seen.
zh: 这是我见过的最可爱的小狗。

en: Never have I seen such a peaceful sight.
zh: 我这辈子还没见过这么宁静的景象。

en: I have read three Shakespearean works up to now.
zh: 到现在为止，我已经读了三部莎士比亚的作品。

en: I have read three of Shakspeare's works so far.
zh: 到目前为止，我已经读了三部莎士比亚的作品。

en: I've never associated you with this place.
zh: 我从来没把你和这地方联系在一起过。

en: I have been studying English for three years.
I am about to take my last voyage, a great leap in the dark.
zh: 我快要开始最后的旅程了，那是向黑暗跨出的一大步。

en: I'm playing football now.
I am suffering from a bad cold.
I am playing the piano now.
I don't want to eat lunch now.
I don't feel like going out right now.
I do not play tennis as much as I used to.
zh: 我打网球不像以前那么勤了。

en: I don't play tennis as much as I used to.
zh: 我打网球不像以前那么勤了。

en: I am playing volleyball now.
I am not happy with my job.
I am not satisfied with my present lot.
I had to come to terms with my present salary.
zh: 我不得不接受我现在的工资。

en: I am busy cooking at the moment.
I was about to leave when you came in.
zh: 你进来的时候我正要走。

en: I am learning her name still, too.
I still bear her name in mind.
I still think about her from time to time.
I still correspond with an old friend of mine from time to time.
zh: 我偶尔还会和一位老朋友写信联系。

en: I have no remembrance of it now.
zh: 我现在对那件事一点印象都没有了。

en: I am about as big as my father now.
zh: 我现在长得跟我爸差不多大了。

en: I have a lot of problems at the moment.
zh: 我现在有很多麻烦事儿。

en: I will do it right now.
I am playing the guitar now.
I do not need money now.
I don't need money now.
I am not now in a position to help you.
I am in no humor for reading now.
I feel like taking a bath now.
I am now on duty.
I was chilled to the bone.
As soon as I sat down, I fell asleep.
I put on my glasses to see the blackboard.
I have a black and white dog.
zh: 我有一只黑白相间的狗。

en: I have a black and a white coat.
zh: 我有一件黑色大衣和一件白色大衣。

en: I passed a test in Japanese.
I can not feel at home in a luxurious hotel.
zh: 豪华酒店让我觉得不自在。

en: I ran away from the training camp.
I have never been to the U.S.
I had a high fever; otherwise I could have gone camping.
zh: 我发高烧了，不然我就去露营了。

en: I see much of Takaoka.
I have a terror of heights.
I'm a high school student.
I am in the first year of high school.
I'm a tenth grader.
I'm in the tenth grade.
The last time I read classical Japanese literature was in high school.
zh: 我上次读日本古典文学还是在高中。

en: I think I will go to London after finishing high school.
zh: 我想高中毕业后去伦敦。

en: I completed the whole high school curriculum.
zh: 我把高中的课都学完了。

en: I am in the second year of high school.
I'm an eleventh grader.
I'm a junior in high school.
I'm in the eleventh grade.
I take my dog for a walk, rain or shine.
zh: 无论刮风下雨，我都会带狗去散步。

en: I sat at the front in order to hear the lecture clearly.
zh: 为了听清讲座，我坐到了前排。

en: I fell asleep in the middle of the lecture.
zh: 讲座听到一半我就睡着了。

en: I need time to mull things over before I decide what to do.
zh: 做决定之前，我得先琢磨琢磨。

en: I thought of various factors before I acted.
zh: 行动前我考虑了各种因素。

en: I can't go, nor do I want to.
I cannot go. For one thing I have no money.
I can not go, nor do I want to.
I had no choice but to go.
Ought I to go?
Should I go?
I am afraid to go.
I intended to go, but forgot to.
I had intended to go, but I forgot to.
zh: 我本来打算去的，但忘了。

en: I consented to go.
I didn't want to go, but she had been so kind to me that I couldn't but accept the invitation.
zh: 我本不想去的，但她对我太好了，我没法拒绝她的邀请。

en: I don't think I want to go.
I went there because I wanted to.
I don't have to go-I want to go.
zh: 不是我非得去，而是我想去。

en: I didn't go, but stayed at home.
I advise you not to go.
I didn't go but stayed.
I was searched by the customs officers at the airport.
I guess I'll have to think it over.
I'd like to make it clear that I will not change my mind.
zh: 我要把话挑明，我是不会改变主意的。

en: I put Paul's name forward as a possible candidate.
zh: 我提议让保罗当候选人。

en: I want to drink a cup of tea.
I'd like to drink a cup of tea.
I like coffee better than tea.
I don't like either tea or coffee.
I do not like tea, so I generally drink coffee for breakfast.
zh: 我不喜欢喝茶，所以早饭一般喝咖啡。

en: I don't like tea, so I generally drink coffee for breakfast.
zh: 我不喜欢喝茶，所以早饭一般喝咖啡。

en: I paid in coin.
I don't mind.
I met the principal himself.
I spoke to the principal himself.
zh: 我直接跟校长本人谈的。

en: I took on the job of proofreading.
I had my purse stolen in the changing room.
zh: 我钱包在更衣室被偷了。

en: I read fifty pages further.
I cannot pass the matter by without making a protest.
zh: 这事儿我得抗议，不能就这么算了。

en: I have never been to Hiroshima.
I will define happiness as this.
I want to live a happy life.
I lead a happy life.
I had a happy childhood.
I feel happy.
I am happy.
I'm happy.
I am far from happy.
I'm far from happy.
I looked back upon my happy school days.
zh: 我回想起了快乐的学生时代。

en: I was too happy to sleep.
I lent the record to Ken, not to Koji.
zh: 我把唱片借给Ken了，没借给Koji。

en: I had the good fortune to be chosen.
I was lucky enough to get a good seat.
zh: 我运气挺好，坐到了个好位子。

en: I had the luck to find a good job.
zh: 我运气不错，找了份好工作。

en: I realized how rare happy people were.
zh: 我意识到幸福的人真不多。

en: I had the fortune to win the first prize in the speech contest.
zh: 我很幸运地拿了演讲比赛的一等奖。

en: I pointed to the factory.
I took advantage of an opportunity.
I only asked you the question out of curiosity.
zh: 我就是好奇才问你那个问题的。

en: I went there out of curiosity.
zh: 我是因为好奇才去那儿的。

en: I like to decorate my apartment to suit my taste.
zh: 我喜欢按自己的喜好来布置公寓。

en: I know the man sitting over there.
zh: 我认识坐在那边的那个男的。

en: I'm more interested in spoken English.
zh: 我对英语口语更感兴趣。

en: I had hardly opened my mouth, when she interrupted me.
zh: 我刚要开口，就被她给打断了。

en: I taste, eat and drink with my mouth.
zh: 我用嘴尝味道、吃东西和喝水。

en: My tongue failed me.
I'm a government worker.
I am not accustomed to making speeches in public.
I like going for a walk in the park.
I went for a walk in the park.
I have lost my umbrella somewhere in the park. I have to buy one.
zh: 我把伞丢在公园某处了，得去买一把。

en: I walk to the park.
I go to the park.
I'll go to the park.
I like to go to the park and watch the children in the playground enjoying themselves.
zh: 我喜欢去公园看孩子们在游乐场开心地玩。

en: I saw him in the park.
I found the lost ball in the park.
zh: 我在公园里找到了那个丢了的球。

en: I met Ken at the park.
I explained to the host that I had been delayed by a traffic jam.
zh: 我跟主人解释说我因为堵车迟到了。

en: My leg was broken in a traffic accident.
zh: 我的腿在车祸里摔断了。

en: I am by turns an optimist and a pessimist.
zh: 我这人一会儿乐观，一会儿悲观。

en: I am no better than a beggar.
I gave the beggar what money I had.
zh: 我把身上带的钱都给那个乞丐了。

en: I was abashed when my mistakes were pointed out.
zh: 别人指出我的错误时，我觉得挺不好意思的。

en: I want to build up my vocabulary.
zh: 我想多背点单词，增加词汇量。

en: I chose to leave instead of staying behind.
I was bidden to stay behind.
I'll join you later.
I'll follow.
I have been reading a book all morning.
I've been vacuuming the rooms all morning.
zh: 我一上午都在用吸尘器打扫房间。

en: I have been writing letters all morning.
I felt a bit tired from swimming all morning.
zh: 游了一上午泳，我觉得有点累。

en: I work hard in the garden in the morning.
zh: 我上午在花园里干了不少活。

en: I'm on duty from 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.
zh: 我早上九点到下午五点上班。

en: I'm going to leave about ten in the morning.
zh: 我打算上午十点左右走。

en: I take a walk at two in the afternoon.
I arrived at the stadium at 4:00 p.m., but the game had already started.
zh: 我下午四点到体育场的时候，比赛都已经开始了。

en: I slept the whole afternoon away.
I'm not free to go this afternoon.
zh: 我今天下午没空，去不了。

en: I spent the afternoon painting a picture.
I am free this afternoon.
I have been reading books all afternoon.
I've been reading that book all afternoon.
zh: 那本书我一下午都在看。

en: I have been reading the book all afternoon.
zh: 我一下午都在看这本书。

en: I studied for a while in the afternoon.
We had to cooperate with each other.
I have been studying English for five years.
I will finish the work in five days.
zh: 我五天内就能把这活儿干完。

en: I aimed at the tiger and fired, but missed him.
zh: 我瞄准老虎开了一枪，但没打着。

en: I had my photo taken on the shore of the lake.
I swept up dead leaves.
I wrote a letter to my parents at home.
zh: 我给家里的爸妈写了封信。

en: I had the door mended.
I had the door repaired.
I put a new handle to the door.
I like to go to a cabin in the woods to enjoy solitude.
zh: 我喜欢去森林里的小木屋，享受清静。

en: I felt lonely.
I'm getting along with my mother-in-law very well.
zh: 我跟我婆婆相处得挺好的。

en: I am bound to him by a close friendship.
zh: 我和他关系很铁，感情很深。

en: I ran across a rare book in a secondhand bookstore.
zh: 我在旧书店里碰巧发现了一本稀有的书。

en: I'm very interested in classical literature.
zh: 我对古典文学挺感兴趣的。

en: I traded old newspapers for toilet paper.
I saw an old friend of mine.
I met an old friend of mine.
I keep old books with care.
I like my old brass tea pot.
zh: 我挺喜欢我那个旧铜茶壶的。

en: I bought an old car.
I traded in my old car for a new one.
zh: 我把旧车卖了换了辆新的。

en: I have an old bicycle.
